name: Areios: Exploring the red planet
description:
You have just landed on a new planet. What is this gigantic tower facing up toward you? Let's start exploring!

Areios is an exploration game. The player is free to move in this open environment, but check out your oxygen level! The environment has been made entirely in Unreal Engine 5. Areios is a game still in development, as there are very few features included at the moment.


Screenshots from Areios Game
